article_text:
Preet Bharara became the toast of the press corps with his insider-trading prosecutions, but the media are now underplaying his retreat as the U.S. Attorney is having to concede his legal errors. So allow us to highlight Mr. Bharara’s extraordinary decision last Thursday to dismiss the charges against seven defendants.

Prosecutors don’t typically abandon cases they’ve already won, but Mr. Bharara was forced to do so after the Second...

twitter.description: U.S. Attorney Preet Bharara is forced to abandon seven of his wrongful insider-trading prosecutions, says a Wall Street Journal editorial.
twitter.title: Preet’s Insider-Trading Retreat

article_summary:
Prosecutors don’t typically abandon cases they’ve already won, but Mr. Bharara was forced to do so after the Second...
Preet Bharara became the toast of the press corps with his insider-trading prosecutions, but the media are now underplaying his retreat as the U.S. Attorney is having to concede his legal errors.
So allow us to highlight Mr. Bharara’s extraordinary decision last Thursday to dismiss the charges against seven defendants.
